comments.author: Rob
comments.body: Alas, I'm going to the dentist. One of my favorite loops; enjoy it for me :)

comments.author: iSean
comments.body: Double-alas. I have Wiki training sessions to do all afternoon. Believe me, I'd rather be Frenzing it up... iSean

comments.author: iSean
comments.body: Score: 5 Font: 15/34 I gave up after this. 34 fonts is a little much (especially since I apparently suck at identifying fonts)

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I fell asleep somewhere around font # 25.... the chunky one with the squishy serifs. I think I was doing pretty well, but when my head hit the keyboard, it must've closed the page. I'll try again in the morning when things are back in focus. Great ride today! I always forget how nice it feels to spin along on the flats. I had great fun chasing the three little dots on the horizon (SB, KN, GS). Man, were they little!
